resources.string: You have not added any favorites market.
Please select the asset to borrow
The amount of borrowings and collateral did not change.
%s balance is insufficient, please adjust the amount of repayment.
The ratio is lower than %s and you cannot borrow more.
Update position successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
[Tips] \n When the feed price drops to the call price, the system will automatically sell your collateral assets for debt repayment. Please pay attention to adjusting the ratio to control the risk.
The current gateway service is not available. please try again later.
Minimum deposits number: %s%s. Less than the minimum amount will not be credited and cannot be returned.\n
Send only %s to this deposit address. Sending Non-%s to this address will lose it.
After you have deposited the above address, please wait for the network to confirm.\n
Your deposit will be deposited after %s confirmations from the network.\n
If you have any questions, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request deposits address is abnormal, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request deposits address is abnormal, the field \"%s\" verification failed, please contact the gateway customer service.
Request withdraw address is abnormal, please contact the gateway customer service.
The query intermediate account information failed.
Please enter or paste the withdraw address
Please enter a memo or a tag
The withdraw address cannot be empty.
Cannot be less than the minimum amount.
The actual number is too low.
The memo private key is missing and the withdraw is not supported.
Once the withdraw request is issued, it will be irrevocable. Please make sure that your withdraw address and memo are correct.
Memo is missing. Do you continue to withdraw?
Once the withdraw request is issued, it will be irrevocable. Please make sure that your withdraw address is correct.
Submit the withdraw request successfully, but refresh failed, please try again later.
Multi-signature and other functions only support wallet mode. Do you want to create a local wallet file for the current account?
Dear Life Member, you are entitled to an 80% fee cashback.
Upgrade lifetime membership and enjoy an 80% fee cashback.
Upgrade lifetime membership is successful, but refreshing the interface failed, please try again later.
Upgrade lifetime membership will cost %s, do you want to continue?
Please enter a mnemonic, separated by spaces between each word.
The account number consists of lowercase letters, numbers, -, ., and must end with a letter beginning with a letter or number.
More than 12 characters and must contain uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
More than 8 characters and must contain uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
This device does not support importing wallet files.
An unknown error occurred and the wallet could not be imported. Please try again later.
Please enter the above URL on the computer to import the wallet BIN file to the phone.
The device network is abnormal. You cannot import the wallet at this time. Please try again later.
Only supports importing wallets via WIFI network.
Failed to read the wallet file.
The wallet file is invalid or the password is incorrect.
This wallet is not a Bitshares wallet.
The wallet is empty, please re-select.
The wallet contains multiple accounts and does not support import.
The wallet does not contain a private key, please re-select.
The query account failed. Please try again later.
The wallet does not contain an active key. Please re-import.
The wallet does not contain the full active permission key, please re-import.
The account name cannot be empty. Please re-enter.
The wallet password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The wallet password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The wallet password format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The password is different, please re-enter.
The account name does not exist. Please re-enter.
The account name already exists. Please re-enter.
The password is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The private key is invalid. Please re-enter.
The private key is incorrect. Please re-enter.
The brain key is incorrect. Please re-enter.
Insufficient active permission, can not be imported.
The account format is incorrect. Please re-enter.
Registration is successful, but the refresh fails. You can log in directly later.
The registration is successful, but query account data failed. Please restart the app.

Tip: The password format can be viewed by clicking on the question mark. \nNote: Bitshares is a decentralized blockchain application. Once the password is lost or forgotten, it will not be retrieved. Please keep it in a safe place.

Tip: The password format can be viewed by clicking on the question mark. \nNote: Bitshares is a decentralized blockchain application. If the wallet file or password is lost or forgotten, it is not possible to retrieve it. It is recommended that you back up the wallet file after registration and keep it in a safe place. \n※ Wallet mode is recommended.
The device has too many registered accounts.
Registration is too frequent, please try again later.
The device does not support backup wallet files.
An unknown error has occurred and the wallet cannot be backed up. Please try again later.
Please enter the above URL on the computer to download the wallet BIN file and backup to a safe place.
The device network is abnormal. You cannot back up your wallet at this time. Please try again later.
Only supports backup wallets under WIFI network.
Logging out will delete the account information from the device, please confirm that you have made a backup. Do you want to continue logging out?
You don\'t have active permissions for account %s, do you want to create a proposal?
You don\'t have owner permissions for account %s, do you want to create a proposal?
Please select a proposal creator account.
Dangerous account %s, the system has blocked this operation for your account and financial security.
The proposal is in review. cannot add approval.
You do not have any permissions to perform an approval operation.
You have not approved it and do not need to remove it.
Please select to remove the approved account
Please select to add the approved account
Please select a fee paying account.
There is no active private key for %s, this account cannot be used to pay the fee.
The network request is abnormal and the evaluation failed. Please try again later.
%1$s submit a sell order. sell %3$s at %2$s.
%1$s submit a buy order. buy %3$s at %2$s.
Order %s has been canceled, but refresh failed. Please try again later.
The vesting balance can only be withdrawn after %s.
The vesting numbers is ZERO, please wait.
The vesting balance %s was successfully withdraw.
The limit order was created successfully.
The order was placed successfully and the order #%s has been completed.
The limit order was created successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
The order total is too low.
The send was successful, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
The FROM account and the TO account cannot be the same.
The account does not have a memo private key and does not support memo.
The wallet does not have a memo private key and does not support memo.
Please select the asset to transfer
The preimage format is 20 characters or more and must contain both uppercase letters and numbers.
Please enter the preimage hash value.
Please enter a valid preimage hash value.
Near the expiration date of Contract A, there is a security risk and Contract B cannot be created. Please contact the other party to extend the contract expiry.
Please confirm that the \"Preimage\" has been backed up. If the preimage is lost, it only can be automatically unlocked after the contract expires. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
It is recommended that \"Expiry\" must be \"less than\" the expiry of the other party's contract for more than 2 days, otherwise it may cause asset loss. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
Proactively create a contract, please back up the \"preimage\". If the preimage is lost, it only can be automatically unlocked after the contract expires. Do you want to continue creating contracts?

Passive deployment contract please carefully confirm that the other party has deployed the same contract and carefully check the various parameters. 

※ Note ※
1. the preimage hash and the preimage length must match the other party perfectly. 
2. It is recommended that "Expiry" must be "less than" the expiry of the other party's contract for more than 2 days, otherwise it may cause asset loss. Do you want to continue creating contracts?
The HTLC was created successfully, view the HTLC details on the \"My Balance\".
The HTLC was created successfully, but the refresh interface failed. You can view the HTLC details on the \"My Balance\".
The HTLC related parameters committees have not been configured, please try again later.
It has reached the maximum expiry and cannot be extended any longer.
Extend the expiry %s days and do not reduce it after the extension. Whether to continue?
The preimage hash has been copied: %s
The voting information has not changed. No need to submit.
You set up a voting proxy. Manually editing the voting information will cancel the proxy and continue to vote?
%s successfully, but the refresh failed. Please try again later.
The account already exists. Please do not import it again.
Keep at least one account in your wallet.
Deleting an account will be deleted along with the private key associated with the account. Please confirm that you have made a backup. Do you want to continue deleting?
You can only import up to %s accounts.
%s is not a multi-signed account and cannot be imported.
%1$s submit a sell order. sell %3$s at %2$s.
%1$s submit a buy order. buy %3$s at %2$s.
%s add %s to the whitelist and blacklist.
%s remove %s from the black and white list.
transfer asset from a blind account.
HTLC expires. assets are automatically returned to %s. #%s

Bitshares Mobile App is a decentralized exchange (DEX) product based on Bitshares graphene technology, developed from the product experience and developed with native technology comparable to the first-class centralized exchange. 

Contact us
WeChat: bts-pp
E-mail: contactsbtsplusplus.com
Telegram: https://t.me/btsplusplus
Website: https://btspp.io
Insufficient handling fee, please make sure that the account has sufficient BTS/CNY/USD to pay the network fee.
The request failed. Please try again later.
Please enter a valid Bitshares account
Click to search for new assets
You can only customize up to %s pairs.
Network error, please try again later.

The APP network init failed. please follow the steps below: \n1. If you are starting up for the first time, please allow the application to use wireless data. \n2. other cases. please check the device network.
Discover the new version v%s, go to the update.
The upload is successful, please continue to complete the import operation on your phone.
Delete the file %s from the device, OK?
Get the phone address is abnormal, please try again later.
Initialization failed, please restart the app and try again.
Failed to export the wallet, please try again later.
Please select the action to perform
Please select the type of account to import
